content: He challenges me to look at my convictions. Do they come from a place inside myself, or were they dictated by others? It is strange finding parts of yourself without ever realizing they had been lost. It’s like being tapped on the back and when you look around, someone is holding part of you and asks: “Excuse me, it this yours?” Your first reaction is more startled than happy. And confused because you can’t quite remember where this piece fit in. You have to expand your sense of self in order to include it again.
